messages.message:
<!here> :warning: I'm going to kick off the GCR -> GAR migration for `instabase-dogfood` momentarily!

It should be a transparent operation, given the nature of the automated workflow provided by GCP. I'll post status update here when it's done, and with any luck it'll be smooth sailing. :+1:

Alrighty, the main interactive part is done, and per the tooling
```*gcr.io (http://gcr.io) traffic is now being served by Artifact Registry for instabase-dogfood. Missing images are being copied from Container Registry```
The bulk copy operation is running now, but things should continue to function as normal. Let me know if you find that Dogfood deployments are failing to push to / pull from GCR.

All done!
```instabase-dogfood: Successfully copied 4394 additional tags and 2620 additional manifests. There were 0 failures.```
Same rules as before - if dogfood's GCR operations go :boom: let me know

Wooohoo
```16:25:58  #12 exporting to image
16:26:00  #12 pushing layers 1.9s done
16:26:00  #12 pushing manifest for gcr.io/instabase-dogfood/control-plane:24.09.30-afbee521bc@sha256:3b9743d8b630c10f8d1fa27b16369db12e65da0953ec19e641f106021958dbb3 (http://gcr.io/instabase-dogfood/control-plane:24.09.30-afbee521bc@sha256:3b9743d8b630c10f8d1fa27b16369db12e65da0953ec19e641f106021958dbb3)
16:26:00  #12 pushing manifest for gcr.io/instabase-dogfood/control-plane:24.09.30-afbee521bc@sha256:3b9743d8b630c10f8d1fa27b16369db12e65da0953ec19e641f106021958dbb3 (http://gcr.io/instabase-dogfood/control-plane:24.09.30-afbee521bc@sha256:3b9743d8b630c10f8d1fa27b16369db12e65da0953ec19e641f106021958dbb3) 0.6s done
16:26:00  #12 DONE 2.7s```
Seems happy to me.

:white_check_mark: Going to call this a success - dogfood services all built successfully, and I manually confirmed that the control-plane pod is running the same image as was pushed above - meaning push and pull both work. Yaaayyyy.
